thread.section_title: William A.Galston - News, Articles, Biography, Photos - WSJ.com
thread.title: Donald Trump and Rex Tillerson: Timeline of Their Ups and Downs

author: A Wall Street Journal Roundup
title: Donald Trump and Rex Tillerson: Timeline of Their Ups and Downs
text:
President Donald Trump said Tuesday that Mike Pompeo would be nominated to be secretary of state, replacing Rex Tillerson. Mr. Tillerson, a former chief executive of Exxon Mobil Corp., was frequently at odds with Mr. Trump on various issues.
Feb. 1, 2017 The Senate confirmed Mr. Tillerson as secretary of state. In his confirmation hearing, Mr. Tillerson voiced a range of views that differed from those expressed by Mr. Trump, including a hawkish line toward Russia in some instances.
...
